sentences.sContent: The funeral will be held at St. Martin’s Church.
sentences.sCn: 葬礼将在圣马丁教堂举行。

sentences.sContent: Hundreds of mourners attended the funeral of the two boys.
sentences.sCn: 数百名哀悼者参加了那两个男孩的葬礼。

sentences.sContent: the minister who conducted the funeral service
Nelson’s funeral procession down the Thames
sentences.sCn: 沿泰晤士河而下为纳尔逊送葬的队伍

sentences.sContent: Ramdas set fire to the funeral pyre .
sentences.sCn: 拉姆达斯点燃了火葬柴堆。

words.tran: 悲哀的；送葬的；适合葬礼的

trans.tranOther: a religious ceremony for burying or  cremating (= burning )  someone who has died
